column3: str
Judging by the hunter's jovial expression, the hunt is still on.
Speak with the hearty hunter.
The great hunter returns. You did well taking on that Rathalos.
Though I must ask: was the battle grueling? Did the mountains sing with the sound of claws clashing with steel?
What will you say?
I've had tougher battles.
It was admittedly more trouble than I expected.
Ah, but of course. Perhaps battle with a high-ranking Rathalos would have put a bit of sweat on your brow.
Truly? I shudder to think what would have happened had you encountered a high-ranking Rathalos, then.
Piqued your curiosity, have I? Well, I can only tell you what I've heard.
They say there is a stronger brood of Rathalos that would make short work of your average hunter.
Mayhap that kitten friend of yours knows something of it. He was, after all, the one who originally posted a bill for the beast.
No need to worry over it now, though. I'd say you've earned a rest after your recent exertions in the Azim Steppe. When you're up for another hunt I'll be here, ready and waiting.
The mighty hunter returns, and with <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> feline companion!
Feline!? How rude! I am a <Emphasis>Felyne</Emphasis> you dullard!

I...fail to see the difference...
Ahem. But that is neither here nor there. I asked <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/> to bring you here that we might learn the truth of these high-ranking Rathalos I recently caught wind of.
High Rank Rathalos? They're an older, much more powerful brood of wyvern...
Without sufficient protection, even the simplest of swipes is all it would take to rend a hunter in two.
If I didn't know better, I'd say you were talking about an elite mark. Yes, a challenge no self-respecting hunter can ignore!
It's settled, then. Are you ready, my friend?
Aye! Let's get to it!
Your enthusiasm is appreciated, but now isn't the time to be kitten around. To be purrrfectly plain, I'd rather not see another hunter charbroiled today.
You have unlocked the Great Hunt (Extreme). Test your mettle against High Rank Rathalos and reap rich rewards!
Please note you may only enter the Great Hunt (Extreme) with four players.
